bodewig@apache.org
text:
It doesn't and it shouldn't :-)

ant-junit-x.jar contains support for JUnit3 and the shared classes used to support JUnit3 and JUnit4. ant-junit4-x.jar contains the classes needed to support JUNit4 on top of that.

You must tell Ivy to also download ant-junit4-1.9.6.jar
